description: Try our easy to follow Pizza Bianca With Rosemary And Garlic recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pizza Bianca With Rosemary And Garlic Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to its highest setting. Very lightly oil a baking tray and put it in the oven to get hot. They both need to be really hot before cooking the pizza.
Place the dough on a floured surface and use a rolling pin to roll it out as thin as you can - about 25-30cm in diameter. Sprinkle the hot baking tray with semolina and transfer the dough onto it.

Stab the pizza base all over with a fork, then scatter the rosemary, garlic, and plenty of salt over the top and pat flat. Drizzle with olive oil, then bake for 10 minutes, or until the top is melted.
